results.title: My nightmare has just begun
results.creator_credit: Linda Lord, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Linda Lord recounts the day the Gippsland bushfires came to her home. Despite undergoing fire training and preparation, when the fire front approached, there was no time to think. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linda Lord, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Linda Lord recounts the day the Gippsland bushfires came to her home. Despite undergoing fire training and preparation, when the fire front approached, there was no time to think. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
description_for_label: Linda Lord recounts the day the Gippsland bushfires came to her home. Despite undergoing fire training and preparation, when the fire front approached, there was no time to think. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: D-Day
results.creator_credit: Darryl Jordan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Darryl Jordan and his partner prepare their home for the encroaching bushfires. The wait for D-day is all-consuming for this family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Darryl Jordan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Darryl Jordan and his partner prepare their home for the encroaching bushfires. The wait for D-day is all-consuming for this family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: Grateful angels
results.creator_credit: Roslyn Evans, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Grateful and Angels are Roslyn Evans’ treasured cows that she nearly lost in the Gippsland bushfires. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: Community under siege
results.creator_credit: Suzanne Davies, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In her role as a co-ordinator of the community centre, Suzanne Davies recounts the devastation that the Gippsland bushfires caused her community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: Dad's tools
results.creator_credit: Fred Atwell, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: There is a lot to do after a bushfire but Fred Atwell wants more than anything to find his dad’s cherished homemade tools. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fred Atwell, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Where Do I Belong?
results.creator_credit: Rita el-Khoury, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Rita el-Khoury travels to Lebanon every year. She calls Australia and Lebanon her home but it wasn’t until she was caught in the middle of the 2006 Israeli bombing of Beiruit that she fully appreciated what that meant.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rita el-Khoury, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Spaces in Between
results.creator_credit: Carla Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Carla Pascoe traces her family’s ancestry from Lebanon and contemplates the mysterious circumstances of her great grandfather’s migration, as well as the undocumented moments of her family’s history.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Carla Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Affliction of Memory
results.creator_credit: Zeina Zogheib, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For Zeina Zogheib the aroma of coffee and the fragrant scent of gardenia bring memories of Lebanon flooding back. A place Zeina and her family fled, due to the ravages of war.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zeina Zogheib, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Lost in Time and Space
results.brief_description: John Star is lost in time and space, a schizophrenic man from the 50th century adrift in the 20th. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
